{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$24.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with GOLDER ASSOCIATES.

Across 394 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 118 have at least one amendment (30%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 163% and the average number of amendments was 1.97. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$74.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.09 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$458.3K. The longest contract was 9.72 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$40.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
